DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate Five-Dimensional Ultrasound automate measurement ovarian follicle control ovarian stimulation contrast conventional 2D ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: This Prospective pilot study perform Fetal Care Unit Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . 72 woman recruit Fetal Care Unit fulfill inclusion criterion . They counsel include study . All case subject : full history take include patient 's age , parity , last menstrual period , past history medical disorder , clinical examination ( General abdominal ) . Two-Dimensional Ultrasound Five-Dimensional Ultrasound do case assessment ovarian follicle control ovarian stimulation clomid 50 mg5×2×1 The automate software allow automate three-dimensional follicular measurement.The software analyze volume automatically identify follicle ovary . The software also automatically generate several volumetric parameter every identified follicle .
DOC.criteria: woman 25 35 year age woman normal body mass index ( 1825kg/M^2 ) regular menstrual cycle woman would receive ovarian stimulation use clomiphene citrate ( clomid 50 mg ) ≥5 day start 5th day cycle scan physician use 2D U/S 5D U/S 1. medical disorder 2. obesity . BMI > 30
